sentence.Network_en: Parliament plans to redraft the law on privatisation.
sentence.Network_cn: 国会计划重新起草私有化法律。

sentence.Network_en: Check and redraft drawings and lists ( all disciplines )
sentence.Network_cn: 检查并重新绘制图纸和拟定列表 ( 所有专业 )

sentence.Network_en: In America, Britain and Canada officials are considering how to redraft fisheries policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国 、 英国和加拿大的官员正在考虑如何重新起草渔业政策.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... redpolled 头顶有红色的 redraft 改写 redraw 重画.

entry.def: If you redraft something you have written, you write it again in order to improve it or change it.

example.ex: Parliament plans to redraft the law on privatisation...
example.tran: 国会计划重新起草私有化法律。

example.ex: The speech had already been redrafted 22 times.
example.tran: 演讲稿已经改写过22遍了。

means.word_mean: 1. a draft for the amount of a dishonored draft plus the costs and charges of drafting again

auth_sentence.content: The commission is expected to redraft its proposals ahead of another vote.
auth_sentence.res_content: The commission is expected to redraft its proposals ahead of another vote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The commission is expected to redraft its proposals ahead of another vote.

auth_sentence.content: That forced Mr. Radwan to redraft the 2011-12 fiscal budget and shift a gaping fiscal shortfall onto domestic lenders.
auth_sentence.res_content: That forced Mr. Radwan to redraft the 2011-12 fiscal budget and shift a gaping fiscal shortfall onto domestic lenders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That forced Mr. Radwan to redraft the 2011-12 fiscal budget and shift a gaping fiscal shortfall onto domestic lenders.
